abate.hook: The BAIT weakens - fish stop biting as intensity drops

abolish.hook: A BULL smashes through and eliminates everything

abrogate.hook: A-BROKE-ATE: broke and ate the contract - abolished it

abrupt.hook: A-RUPT(ure) - a sudden rupture with no warning

absolve.hook: AB-SOLVE: solve away the guilt completely

abstemious.hook: ABS-STEM from eating less - moderate and restrained

abstract.hook: Abstract art - you can't touch it, it's purely theoretical

abstruse.hook: Sounds like OBTUSE - too dense to understand

accent.hook: Put the ACCENT on that syllable - emphasize it!

accentuate.hook: Turn the ACCENT up to max volume - super noticeable

accept.hook: A-CEPT (take in Latin) - just take it, receive it

accessible.hook: ACCESS + ABLE = easy to approach and understand

accolade.hook: A COLA-ADE drink served as a prize - an honor!

accord.hook: A CHORD played in perfect harmony - agreement

acerbic.hook: ACID + HERB - tastes sharp and bitter on your tongue

acquiesce.hook: QUIET + YES: silently saying yes without protest

acquit.hook: A-QUIT: quit the charges - declared not guilty!

acrid.hook: ACID with an R - bitter, harsh, irritating smell

acrimonious.hook: ACRI-MONEY-OUS: fighting over money - bitter and sharp

acrimony.hook: A-CRIME-ON-Y: feels like a crime, so much bitterness

adamant.hook: ADAM the ANT - tiny but absolutely refuses to budge

adapt.hook: A-DAPT: apt to change - adjust to new conditions

admonish.hook: ADD A MONISH-ing tone: gently scold with warning

adopt.hook: A-DOPT: pick it up and drop it into your life - accept

adulate.hook: ADULT-ATE: adults who ate up everything a celebrity did - excessive praise

adulation.hook: ADULT-ation: adults fawning over you with excessive praise

aesthetic.hook: A-STATIC beautiful painting you stare at - relating to beauty

affable.hook: A-FAB-le: FABulously friendly and easy to talk to

affirm.hook: A-FIRM statement: stated firmly as true

affluent.hook: A-FLUENT flow of money - wealthy and abundant

aggrandize.hook: A-GRAND-SIZE: making yourself grand-sized - inflating importance

aggravate.hook: AGGRA-VATE: it aggravates you, making everything worse

agreeable.hook: AGREE-ABLE: able to agree - pleasant and willing

allay.hook: ALL-LAY: lay all your fears to rest

alleviate.hook: ALL-LEAVE-ATE: all the pain leaves - relief!

allusions.hook: ALL-ILLUSIONS: indirect references, like illusions of meaning

aloof.hook: Standing on the ROOF ALone - distant and unfriendly

altruistic.hook: ALL-TRUE-ISTIC: it's all true, they genuinely care for others

ambiguous.hook: AMBI (both) + GUOUS: could go both ways

ambivalent.hook: AMBI (both) + VALENT: pulled in both directions at once

ameliorate.hook: A-MELIORATE: make things MELLOWER and better

amenable.hook: A-MEN-ABLE: able to say 'Amen!' to any suggestion

amiable.hook: AMI (friend in French) + ABLE: able to be a friend

amicable.hook: AMI-CABLE: like a friendly cable connecting two people

amplify.hook: AMP it up! Crank the amplifier - make it stronger

anachronistic.hook: ANA-CHRONIC: chronically out of time - belonging to wrong era

analogous.hook: ANALOG-ous: like an analog copy - similar but not identical

ancillary.hook: ANCILLA (maid in Latin) - plays a supporting role

animus.hook: ANIME villain radiating pure hostility and ill will

annul.hook: A-NULL: make it null and void - declare invalid

anodyne.hook: A-NO-DYNE (pain): no pain here, just soothing relief

anomalous.hook: A-NOT-NORMAL-ous: NOT normal, deviating from the norm

antagonistic.hook: ANT-AGONISTIC: two ants fighting - hostile and opposed

antagonize.hook: ANT-AGONIZE: an ant that agonizes you - provokes hostility

antipathy.hook: ANTI-PATHY (feeling): feeling AGAINST something - strong dislike

antiquated.hook: ANTIQUE-ATED: turned into an antique - outdated and old

antithetical.hook: ANTI-THESIS: against the thesis - directly opposed

apathetic.hook: A-PATH-ETIC: too pathetic to care - showing no interest

apodictic.hook: A-POD-ICTIC: solid as a seed POD - unquestionably true

appease.hook: A-PEACE: bring about PEACE - calm and satisfy

applied.hook: APPLIED to real life - practical, not just theory

appraise.hook: A-PRAISE with a PRICE: evaluate its worth

apprehensive.hook: APPRE-HENSIVE: like a hen nervously pecking - anxious about future

approve.hook: A-PROVE: prove you agree and support it

arcane.hook: Hidden in a sugar CANE field - mysterious and obscure

archaic.hook: ARCH-AIC: old as an ancient Roman ARCH

archetype.hook: ARCH + TYPE: the original TYPE, the ultimate model

ardent.hook: ARSON is ARDENT - burning with passionate fire

arrogant.hook: ARROW-GANT: shooting arrows of ego at everyone - excessive pride

articulate.hook: ART-ICULATE: it's an ART to express clearly

ascetic.hook: A-SKEPTIC of luxury - avoids all comfort and pleasure

assent.hook: A-SENT nod: sent your agreement - formal approval

assess.hook: AS-SESS: sit in SESSION and evaluate carefully

assiduous.hook: ASS-I-DO-US: I do, I do! Working your butt off - persistent effort

assuage.hook: A-SAUSAGE: comfort food that soothes your worries

astute.hook: AS-TUTE: sharp as a TUTOR - clever and perceptive

attenuate.hook: A-TEN-UATE: turn the volume to TEN percent - weaken

audacity.hook: AUDIO-CITY: city so LOUD with boldness and daring

augment.hook: AUG-MENT: August meant bigger harvests - increase and grow

austere.hook: Bare as the Australian OUTBACK - strict and plain

autarkic.hook: AUTO-ARK: Noah's ark runs on its own - self-sufficient

authoritarian.hook: AUTHOR demands you follow every word - strict obedience

autocratic.hook: AUTO-CRATIC: automatic rule by one - absolute power

avant-garde.hook: AVANT (before) + GUARD: the front guard, leading edge

avarice.hook: AVA hoards all the RICE - extreme greed

avaricious.hook: AVA-RICIOUS: sounds VICIOUS about grabbing money

avert.hook: A-VERT: diVERT away - prevent or turn away

awe.hook: Mouth hanging open, jaw dropped - AWE-struck wonder

axiomatic.hook: AXIOM-ATIC: an AXIOM needs no proof - self-evident

banal.hook: BAN-ALL original thoughts - only boring cliches remain

bantering.hook: BANTER-ING: light playful teasing back and forth

beguile.hook: BE-GUILE: be full of guile - charm with deception

belie.hook: BE-LIE: it's a LIE about what's really underneath

bellicose.hook: BELLY-CLOSE: getting belly-to-belly close for a fight - warlike

belligerent.hook: BELL-IGERENT: ringing the war BELL - hostile and combative

bemused.hook: BE-MUSED: NOT amused, just confused and puzzled

beneficent.hook: BENE (good) + FICENT: actively doing GOOD - charitable

beneficial.hook: BENEFIT-CIAL: packed full of BENEFITS - helpful

benevolent.hook: BENE-VOLENT: bene means good - good-willed and kind

benign.hook: BE-NINE: gentle as a 9-year-old kid - harmless

berate.hook: BE-RATE: RATE someone harshly - scold with anger

bereft.hook: BE-LEFT: left behind with nothing - deprived and lacking

betray.hook: Serve secrets on a TRAY - reveal or be disloyal

biased.hook: BI-ASED: leaning to one side unfairly, off-center

blunt.hook: A BLUNT knife - no sharp edge, no tact, just direct

bolster.hook: A BOLSTER pillow props you up - support and strengthen

bombastic.hook: BOMB-ASTIC: words that BOMB you with pompous hot air

bona fide.hook: Down to the BONE genuine - real and authentic

bristle.hook: Porcupine BRISTLES standing up in anger - react defensively

brusque.hook: Rough as a BRUSH scraping - abrupt and unfriendly

buoyant.hook: BUOY-ANT: like a buoy floating on water - cheerful and uplifted

burdensome.hook: BURDEN-SOME: it's quite a heavy BURDEN to bear

bureaucratic.hook: The BUREAU runs on rigid rules and red tape

burgeon.hook: BURGER joints are BOOMING - growing rapidly everywhere

buttress.hook: Your BUTT RESTS against a support wall - strengthen

byzantine.hook: Byzantine Empire politics - overly complex and confusing

camaraderie.hook: CAMERA-DERIE: friends taking camera selfies - mutual trust and warmth

candid.hook: CANDID camera catches you being totally honest

candor.hook: CANDLE's clear flame - honesty that shines bright

canonical.hook: Part of the official CANON - accepted as standard

cantankerous.hook: CAN'T stop being ANGRY - bad-tempered and argumentative

capitulate.hook: The CAPITAL city waves a white flag and surrenders

capricious.hook: Weather in CAPRI changes every minute - unpredictable

captivating.hook: It CAPTUREs you like a captive - very engaging

careless.hook: CARE-LESS: caring less about details - negligent

castigate.hook: CAST harsh words at the GATE - scold severely

casuistic.hook: CASUAL-looking logic that's actually tricky reasoning

catalyze.hook: A chemistry CATALYST speeds up the reaction

categorical.hook: Put in a definite CATEGORY - absolute, no exceptions

caustic.hook: CAUSTIC soda BURNS - like biting harsh criticism

cautious.hook: CAUTION tape everywhere - be very careful!

celebrate.hook: CELEB-RATE: rate someone like a CELEBRITY - praise publicly

censure.hook: CENSOR + SURE: sure to be officially criticized

changeable.hook: CHANGE-ABLE: able to change at any moment - unstable

chaotic.hook: Full of CHAOS - disorderly and confused

characterize.hook: Define the CHARACTER of something - describe its traits

charitable.hook: CHAR-IT-ABLE: able to share - generous and kind

charlatan.hook: CHAR-LATIN: charring your trust with fake Latin - a fraud

chastise.hook: CHASE-TIES: chasing someone to tie them up and scold them

chicanery.hook: She CAN trick everyone - deception and trickery

chimerical.hook: Like a CHIMERA - fantasy creature that's unrealistic

chronic.hook: CHRONIC clock that never stops ticking - persisting endlessly

circumlocution.hook: CIRCUM-LOCUTION: circling around the location of the point - roundabout speech

circumlocutory.hook: Talking in CIRCLES (circum) around the point - wordy

circumspect.hook: CIRCUM (around) + SPECT (look): look all around first - cautious

clandestine.hook: The CLAN meets in secret, hidden from everyone

clement.hook: Sounds like GENTLE-MENT: gentle treatment - mild and merciful

clichéd.hook: CLI-SHED: time to shed these worn-out overused phrases

cloistered.hook: CLOISTER: closed in a cloister monastery - sheltered from the world

coerce.hook: CO-FORCE: forcing someone to cooperate - compulsion through pressure

cogent.hook: CO-GENT: a gentleman's cooperation with logic - convincing

cognizant.hook: COG-NIZANT: cogs turning in your brain - aware and knowing

coherent.hook: CO-HERE: ideas sticking HERE together logically

colloquial.hook: COLLEAGUE talk at the water cooler - informal speech

commend.hook: COME + MEND: come and mend things with praise

compatible.hook: COM-PAT-IBLE: able to pat each other's backs - working well together

compelling.hook: It COMPELS you to listen - irresistibly convincing

complacent.hook: Comfortable in your PLACE - too self-satisfied to notice danger

compliance.hook: COMPLY-ANCE: tendency to COMPLY and follow rules

complicate.hook: Add COMPLEX layers - make it more tangled

compound.hook: POUND things together - combine and often worsen

concede.hook: CON-CEDE: cede (give up) ground - admit reluctantly

conciliatory.hook: Like a peace COUNCIL - trying to calm the conflict

concise.hook: CON-CISE: make an incision, CUT it short - brief but complete

concur.hook: CON-CUR: 'con' together + 'cur' run = running together in agreement

condemn.hook: CON-DEMN: DAMN strongly and publicly criticize

condescending.hook: CON-DESCENDING: descending to talk down to people - patronizing

condone.hook: CON-DONE: it's DONE, let it slide - allow wrongdoing

conducive.hook: CONDUCTS you toward a good result - helpful

congenial.hook: CON-GENIAL: a GENIUS at being friendly and pleasant

conjecture.hook: CON-LECTURE: lecturing without facts - opinion without evidence

consensus.hook: CON-SENSE-US: a common sense among us - general agreement

consistent.hook: CON-SIST-ENT: it PERSISTS the same way - stable

consolidate.hook: CON-SOLID-ATE: making things solid together - combine and strengthen

consternation.hook: CON-STAR-NATION: a nation of stars in shock - dismay and anxiety

contemptuous.hook: CONTEMPT-U-OUS: full of contempt for you - deeply disrespectful

contend.hook: CON-TEND: TEND to enter the contest and argue your point

contentious.hook: Nobody's CONTENT - everyone's arguing about it

contingent.hook: CON-TINGENT: it hinges (TINGE) on whether conditions are met

contradict.hook: CONTRA-DICT: speak (dict) AGAINST (contra) what was said

contrarian.hook: CONTRARY-AN: a person who is always contrary - opposes all views

contravene.hook: CONTRA-VENE: contra means against, vene like venue - go against the rules

contrived.hook: A CON that feels forced and artificial - not natural

controvert.hook: CONTRA + OVERT: overtly going against an argument

conventional.hook: Following the CONVENTION - traditional and typical

convivial.hook: CON-VIVIAL: full of VIVE (life) - friendly and lively

convoluted.hook: CON-VOLUTED: so many VOLUMES of twisted complexity

cooperative.hook: CO-OPERATIVE: operating together willingly as a team

copious.hook: COPY-OUS: so much you could copy endlessly - abundant

corroborate.hook: Two CO-ROBBERs confirm each other's alibi with evidence

cosmopolitan.hook: COSMO magazine reader - worldly and culturally diverse

covert.hook: COVER-T: under COVER, hidden from sight

coy.hook: KOI fish hiding behind rocks - deliberately shy and evasive

cozen.hook: COUSIN who COZENs you out of your inheritance - deceive and swindle

credulous.hook: Gives CRED to everything they hear - too ready to believe

critical.hook: CRIT-ICAL: lands a CRITICAL hit - sharp analysis matters

cryptic.hook: Hidden in a CRYPT - mysterious and hard to decode

culpable.hook: CULPRIT-ABLE: able to be the culprit - deserving blame

cupidity.hook: CUPID shot you with greed arrows instead of love

cursory.hook: Moving the CURSOR quickly - just skimming the surface

curt.hook: CUT short rudely - like CURTains slamming shut

curtail.hook: CUT the TAIL short - reduce and limit

cynical.hook: Sees SIN in everyone's motives - deeply distrustful

dearth.hook: Sounds like DEATH of supply - extreme scarcity

debilitate.hook: DE-ABILITY-TATE: taking away your abilities - weaken severely

debunk.hook: DE-BUNK: remove the BUNK (nonsense) - expose as false

deceptive.hook: Full of DECEPTION - misleading you on purpose

decisive.hook: Makes a firm DECISION and sticks with it - conclusive

decline.hook: Going down the INCLINE - decrease or refuse

decry.hook: DE-CRY: cry out against something - publicly condemn

defective.hook: Has a DEFECT - flawed and not working right

defend.hook: Put up a FENCE (de-fend) to protect and argue for

defer.hook: DE-FER: 'fer' means carry - carry it to later, or carry respect to someone

deferential.hook: DEFER-ENTIAL: essential to defer - showing respectful submission

defunct.hook: DE-FUNCT: no longer functioning - dead and gone

deleterious.hook: DELETE-RIOUS: so harmful you want to DELETE it from life

deliberate.hook: De-LIBERATE: freeing yourself to think carefully and intentionally

democratic.hook: DEMOS (people) rule - based on equality and majority

demonstrate.hook: DEMO-NSTRATE: give a DEMO to show something clearly

demure.hook: Sounds like DE-MURE: quietly mured (walled) in - modest and reserved

denigrate.hook: DE-NEGATE: make someone NEGATIVE - unfairly criticize

deny.hook: Say NAY (NO) to everything - refuse to admit

depict.hook: DE-PICT: create a PICTURE - portray visually

deplete.hook: DE-PLETE: de-complete - use up until empty

deplore.hook: DE-PLORE: imPLORE against something - strongly disapprove

deride.hook: DE-RIDE: take someone for a RIDE and mock them

derivative.hook: DERIVED from somewhere else - a copy, unoriginal

describe.hook: A SCRIBE writes to explain - that's what you do

desolate.hook: DE-SOLE-ATE: the sole person left eating alone - barren and bleak

despondent.hook: DE-SPONDENT: a sponge drained of water - in low spirits, hope drained

destitute.hook: DE-STITUTE: de-instituted from having anything - extremely poor

detrimental.hook: DE-TRIM-ENTAL: trimming away the good - causing harm

deviate.hook: DE-VIA-ATE: taking a different via (road) - depart from the course

devolution.hook: DE-VOLUTION: reverse of EVOLUTION - power going downward

dialectical.hook: A DIALOGUE between opposing ideas that creates truth

dichotomy.hook: DI (two) + CHOT (cut): cutting sharply into TWO parts

didactic.hook: DID-ACTIC: the teacher DID teach you, maybe too preachy

diffident.hook: DIFF from CONFIDENT - shy and lacking confidence

dignified.hook: Filled with DIGNITY - calm and respectful bearing

digress.hook: DI-GRESS: grass growing in different directions - straying from topic

digression.hook: DI-GRESSION: wandering off in a different direction from the topic

dilatory.hook: Sounds like DELAY-TORY: causing annoying delays

diligent.hook: DILL-I-GENT: a gentle dill farmer carefully tending herbs - persistent effort

diminish.hook: DIM-IN-ISH: light getting dim-ish - becoming smaller and less

dirigiste.hook: The state DIRECTS the economy with a firm hand

disapprove.hook: DIS-APPROVE: the opposite of approve - think poorly of

disavow.hook: DIS-AVOW: take back your VOW - deny responsibility

discerning.hook: DIS-CERNING: concerning yourself with distinctions - showing good judgment

discernment.hook: DISCERN-MENT: ability to DISCERN right from wrong

disconsolate.hook: DIS-CONSOLE-ATE: cannot be consoled - deeply unhappy beyond comfort

discord.hook: DIS-CHORD: a broken CHORD - disagreement and conflict

discordant.hook: DIS-CORD: the musical CHORD is broken - not harmonious

discredit.hook: DIS-CREDIT: strip away someone's CREDIT and reputation

discreet.hook: DIS-CREET: keeping things on the down-low on Crete island - avoiding attention

disdain.hook: DIS-STAIN: treating someone like a stain - contempt for the unworthy

disenfranchise.hook: DIS-FRANCHISE: take away the FRANCHISE of rights

disingenuous.hook: DIS-INGENUOUS: NOT genuinely honest - insincere and fake

disinterested.hook: DIS-INTERESTED: not personally interested - impartial judge

dismiss.hook: DIS-MISS: MISS the point on purpose - reject as unimportant

disparage.hook: DIS-PAR-AGE: not on PAR - speak poorly and belittle

disparate.hook: DIS-PAIR-ATE: not a matching PAIR at all - very different

dispassionate.hook: DIS-PASSIONATE: without PASSION - neutral and unemotional

displace.hook: DIS-PLACE: forced out of your PLACE - removed

dispute.hook: DIS-PUTE: putting up a 'dis' - arguing and challenging

dissemble.hook: DIS-SEMBLE: things are not what they SEEM - hiding truth

dissent.hook: DIS-SENT: sending a 'dis' to authority - principled disagreement

dither.hook: DIDN'T pick EITHER - can't decide, hesitating endlessly

diverge.hook: DI-VERGE: two verges going different ways - separate and split apart

divisive.hook: DIVIDE-SIVE: it DIVIDES people into opposing camps

doctrinaire.hook: DOCTRINE-AIRE: all air and doctrine - rigidly committed to theory

dogged.hook: Like a DOG with a bone - stubbornly persistent and tenacious

doggerel.hook: Poetry so bad even a DOG wouldn't wag its tail

dogmatic.hook: Stubborn as a DOG with a bone - won't let go of beliefs

dogmatism.hook: DOG + MATISM: a DOG that never drops its bone of rigid belief

doleful.hook: DOLE-FUL: full of dole (sorrow) - expressing mournful sadness

dormant.hook: DORM-ANT: an ant sleeping in its dorm - inactive but ready to wake

downplay.hook: PLAY it DOWN - minimize the importance

droll.hook: A TROLL that's oddly funny - dry quirky humor

dubious.hook: DUB this trustworthy? Doubtful! Very DUB-ious

duplicity.hook: DUAL personality hiding behind a mask - deceitfulness

durable.hook: DURA means hard - built to last, long-lasting

dwindle.hook: D-WIND-LE: wind blowing things away little by little - gradually diminish

détente.hook: Day of no TAUNTING - tensions ease between rivals

ebb.hook: EBB tide: ocean water pulling back - gradually declining

ebullient.hook: E-BULL-IENT: a bull bursting with energy - overflowing enthusiasm

eccentric.hook: EX-CENTRIC: off-CENTER - unusual and odd behavior

eclectic.hook: E-COLLECT-IC: collecting from everywhere - drawing from varied sources

edifice.hook: An EDIF-ICE palace - a large imposing building of ice

efface.hook: E-FACE: erasing the face - make disappear or make oneself invisible

effacement.hook: E-FACE-MENT: erasing the FACE - making less noticeable

efficacious.hook: EFFICIENT + ACIOUS: efficiently effective at producing results

effusive.hook: Emotions FUSE out like a geyser - overly enthusiastic

egalitarian.hook: EQUAL-ITARIAN: everyone is EQUAL - believes in equality

egregious.hook: E-GREG-IOUS: GREG did something SO shockingly bad

elated.hook: E-LATE-D: elevated so high you're late getting down - ecstatically happy

elegiac.hook: Like an ELEGY at a funeral - mournful and sorrowful

eloquent.hook: ELO-QUENT: speaking with the flow of a queen - fluent and persuasive

elucidate.hook: E-LUCID-ATE: make it LUCID and clear - explain

embellish.hook: EM-BELL-ISH: adding bells to make it prettier - decorate or exaggerate

embellishment.hook: Adding BELLS and whistles - extra decorative details

embrace.hook: Open your arms and BRACE someone - accept willingly

embryonic.hook: Like an EMBRYO - in the earliest stages of development

emerging.hook: MERGING into view - becoming visible and known

empirical.hook: An EMPIRE built on real data and observation, not guesses

enable.hook: EN-ABLE: make someone ABLE to do it - make possible

encomium.hook: EN-COMI-UM: COM(pliment) at maximum volume - formal praise

endemic.hook: END-EMIC: it ENDS up being native to that specific place

endorse.hook: Sign your name on the BACK (dorse) - publicly support

enduring.hook: EN-DURING: lasts DURING a very long time

energize.hook: Inject ENERGY - power up and get moving

enervate.hook: E-NERVE-ATE: removes your NERVE and energy - weakens you

enfranchise.hook: Give the FRANCHISE (right to vote) - grant rights

engaging.hook: It ENGAGES your attention like a cage - fascinating

engender.hook: EN-GENDER: GENERATE or give birth to something new

enhance.hook: EN-HANCE: enhancing your chance - improve and make better

enigma.hook: Like the ENIGMA code machine - wrapped in mystery

enigmatic.hook: ENIGMA-TIC: full of enigma - mysterious and puzzling

enmity.hook: ENEMY-TY: the quality of being ENEMIES - hostility

entrenched.hook: Dug into deep TRENCHES - firmly established, hard to move

ephemeral.hook: Like a Snapchat message - it disappears in seconds

epiphenomenal.hook: EPI (side) + PHENOMENON: just a side effect, not fundamental

epistemology.hook: E-PISTOL-OLOGY: studying how we KNOW which pistol is loaded

equable.hook: EQUAL-BLE: staying EQUAL and even-tempered always

equanimity.hook: EQUA (equal) + ANIMUS (mind): keeping an EQUAL mind under stress

equitable.hook: EQUITY-ABLE: based on EQUITY and fairness

equivocal.hook: EQUI-VOCAL: equal VOICES saying opposite things - ambiguous

equivocate.hook: EQUI-VOCATE: speak equally vague on both sides to avoid commitment

eradicate.hook: E-RAD-ICATE: radically remove - destroy completely at the root

eristic.hook: ER-ISTIC: an aggressive debate-ISTIC style - arguing to win

erode.hook: Waves RODE over the shore for years, wearing it away gradually

erratic.hook: Full of ERRors in pattern - unpredictable and random

erudite.hook: You RUDE-LY show off all your deep learning to everyone

erudition.hook: An EDITION packed with deep scholarly knowledge

escalate.hook: ESCALAT-OR going up - increasing in intensity step by step

esoteric.hook: ESO (inner): only the INNER circle gets it - understood by few

estrange.hook: E-STRANGE: becoming strange to each other - alienate and drive apart

ethical.hook: Following the ETHICS code - morally right behavior

eulogize.hook: EU-LOG-IZE: logging the good (eu=good) things about someone - praise highly

eulogy.hook: EU (good) + LOGY (words): good words spoken about the deceased

euphoria.hook: EU-PHORIA: phoria (carrying) good feelings - intense happiness

evaluate.hook: E-VALUE-ATE: determine the VALUE of something carefully

evanescent.hook: EVAN-ESCENT: Evan's scent vanishing quickly - fleeting and fading

evasive.hook: Trying to EVADE - dodging direct answers like a ninja

evenhanded.hook: Both HANDS are EVEN on the scale - perfectly fair

evolve.hook: E-VOLVE: revolving through changes - develop gradually over time

exacerbate.hook: Sounds like EXASPERATE - makes a bad situation even worse

exacting.hook: Demands EXACT precision - impossibly high standards

exalt.hook: EX-ALT(itude): raise to a high ALTitude of praise

excoriate.hook: EX-CORE: tear out the CORE - criticize so harshly it strips skin

exegetical.hook: EXIT the surface, dig into the TEXT - explaining deeply

exemplify.hook: Be the EXAMPLE - serve as the model to follow

exigent.hook: EXIT now! So urgent you need the emergency EXIT immediately

exonerate.hook: EX-ON-ERATE: get OFF the hook - cleared from all blame

exorbitant.hook: EX-ORBIT-ANT: prices out of orbit - unreasonably high

expedite.hook: Put your FOOT (ped) on the gas pedal - speed things up

explicate.hook: UN-PLICATE (unfold): unfold and explain every detail

explicit.hook: EX-PLICIT: laid out PLAINLY for all to see - no confusion

expunge.hook: EX-SPONGE: sponging out completely - erase and remove

extirpate.hook: EX-STIR-PATE: stirring up and throwing out - root out and destroy

extol.hook: EX-TOLL: ring the TOLL bell loudly in praise

extrapolate.hook: Go EXTRA beyond the data to INTERPOLATE what comes next

extravagant.hook: EXTRA-VAGA-NT: extra vagrant spending - excessively costly

exuberant.hook: Taking an UBER and being SO excited - full of energy

facetious.hook: Keep a straight FACE while joking at the wrong time

facilitate.hook: Make it FACILE (easy) - smooth the path forward

factional.hook: Split into rival FACTIONS fighting each other

factious.hook: FACT-IOUS: a group splitting into factions - prone to internal dissent

fallacious.hook: Based on a FALLACY - false reasoning that seems right

far-fetched.hook: Had to FETCH it from too FAR away - unlikely to be true

fastidious.hook: FAST? NO! Takes forever because they're SO picky about details

fatuous.hook: FAT chance of being smart - silly and completely pointless

fawning.hook: A baby FAWN following you everywhere - overly flattering

feasible.hook: FEAS-IBLE: it's DO-able - possible and workable

feign.hook: Sounds like FAKE-N: faking it, just pretending

felicitous.hook: FELICITY means happiness - something pleasingly well-suited

fervent.hook: FERVor burning hot - intensely passionate about it

feudal.hook: Based on medieval FEUDS - lords and serfs hierarchy

fickle.hook: Like a PICKLE that changes flavor - unreliable and changeable

flagrant.hook: FLAG-RANT: waving a flag while ranting about a wrong - shockingly obvious

flamboyant.hook: A FLAME-BOY on fire - showy, flashy, impossible to miss

flawed.hook: Has a visible FLAW - imperfect and defective

fleeting.hook: A FLEET of ships passing by quickly - gone in seconds

flexible.hook: Can FLEX and bend without breaking - adaptable

flimsy.hook: Thin as photographic FILM - weak and not sturdy

flippant.hook: Casually FLIP about serious matters - disrespectfully casual

fluctuate.hook: FLUX-TUATE: in constant flux - rising and falling irregularly

flux.hook: Everything is in FLOW and FLUX - constant change

foreboding.hook: FORE-BODING: a BODY of trouble lies BEFORE you - sense of doom

forestall.hook: Build a FOREST wall BEFORE trouble arrives - prevent early

forlorn.hook: FOR-LORN: torn apart and left alone - pitifully sad and lonely

formulaic.hook: Follows a fixed FORMULA every time - predictable

forthright.hook: Comes FORTH with what's RIGHT - direct and honest

fortify.hook: FORT-IFY: building a fort - strengthen against attack

foster.hook: A FOSTER parent who encourages growth and development

fractious.hook: FRACTURED temper - irritable, unruly, ready to snap

fragile.hook: Handle with care! FRAGILE sticker - easily broken

frank.hook: Your friend FRANK always tells the honest truth

frivolous.hook: FRIVolity everywhere - not serious at all, totally trivial

frugal.hook: FRU-GAL: a gal who saves her fruits - sparing and thrifty

furtive.hook: Sneaking around in FUR like a cat - secretive and sly

futile.hook: FEW tiles left in the game - useless to keep trying

galvanize.hook: A GALVANIC electric shock jolts you into action!

garrulous.hook: GARgling words endlessly - can't stop talking

generate.hook: A GENERATOR produces and creates electricity

genial.hook: Like a wish-granting GENIE - friendly and cheerful

glib.hook: GLIB = GLoss on the LIPs - smooth-talking but insincere

glut.hook: GLUT-ton of supply - so much it overflows and loses value

grandiloquent.hook: GRAND + ELOQUENT: using fancy GRAND words to sound pompous

gratuitous.hook: Given GRATIS (free) but nobody asked - unnecessary

gregarious.hook: GREG never misses a party - super sociable and friendly

groove.hook: In the GROOVE - everything flows naturally and smoothly

groundbreaking.hook: Literally BREAKING new GROUND - innovative and first-ever

guarded.hook: Has a GUARD up at all times - cautious in speech

guile.hook: GUI-LE: a guileful smile hiding tricks - sly cunning

guileless.hook: GUILE-LESS: zero GUILE - innocent and without deceit

gullible.hook: Like a seaGULL eating anything thrown at it - easily tricked

hackneyed.hook: A lazy HACK's writing - overused and unoriginal

hamper.hook: A laundry HAMPER blocking the hallway - hinders progress

haphazard.hook: Things just HAPpen as HAZARDs - random, no order

harmonious.hook: Full of HARMONY - everything in beautiful agreement

hasten.hook: Make HASTE! Speed up and don't delay

haughty.hook: Nose held so HIGH up - arrogantly looking down on everyone

hegemonic.hook: HE holds the GEM of power - dominant controlling influence

hegemony.hook: HE-GEM-ONLY: he's the only gem - dominance of one over all others

heighten.hook: HEIGHT-EN: making the height bigger - increase and intensify

hermeneutic.hook: HERMES the messenger god interprets divine messages

heterodox.hook: HETERO (different) + DOX (belief): different from accepted beliefs

heuristic.hook: HEY, try this TRICK to learn! - a rule-of-thumb method

hidebound.hook: HIDE-BOUND: bound in a dried hide - stiff and unwilling to change

hierarchical.hook: Arranged in HIER-TIERS of rank - levels of power

hinder.hook: Your HIND (behind) is dragging - obstructing progress

hindsight.hook: Looking BEHIND with perfect SIGHT - understanding after the fact

hostile.hook: The worst HOST ever - unfriendly and aggressive

hostility.hook: HOST-ILITY: a HOST showing ILL will toward guests

hubris.hook: HU-BRIS: huge bris(tle) of ego - excessive pride before a fall

humble.hook: A HUMBLE bumble bee - small, modest, not arrogant

hypothetical.hook: HYPO-THETICAL: hypothesis, not thesis - assumed, not proven

iconoclastic.hook: ICON + CLASTIC (breaking): smashing sacred ICONS of tradition

idiosyncratic.hook: IDIO (own) + SYNC: running on your OWN unique rhythm

idolize.hook: Turn someone into an IDOL - admire them excessively

illogical.hook: IL-LOGICAL: NOT following LOGIC at all

illuminate.hook: Bring LIGHT (lumin) to darkness - clarify everything

illusory.hook: Based on an ILLUSION - not real, just a mirage

imitative.hook: Full of IMITATION - just copying others

immutable.hook: IM-MUTABLE: NOT able to MUTATE - permanently unchangeable

impartial.hook: IM-PARTIAL: NOT PARTIAL to either side - fair judge

impasse.hook: IM-PASS: can NOT PASS through the roadblock - deadlock

impassive.hook: IM-PASSIVE: PASSIVE face showing zero emotion

impeccable.hook: IM-PECCABLE: without a single PECK (flaw) - flawless

impecunious.hook: IM-PECUNI-OUS: no PECUNIA (money in Latin) - broke!

impede.hook: IM-PEDE: blocks your FEET (ped) from moving forward

imperative.hook: The EMPEROR commands it - absolutely necessary to obey

imperious.hook: Acts like an EMPEROR - arrogant and commanding

impetuous.hook: Like a PET that leaps without thinking - rash and impulsive

implacable.hook: IM-PLACABLE: can NOT be PLACATED - impossible to soothe

implausible.hook: IM-PLAUSIBLE: NOT PLAUSIBLE - unlikely to be true

implicate.hook: IM-PLICATE: folded into the plot - shown to be involved in wrongdoing

impoverished.hook: IM-POVERTY-SHED: pushed into the poverty shed - reduced to extreme need

impugn.hook: IM-PUGN: take a PUGnacious swing at someone's honesty

incendiary.hook: IN-CEND: lights a fire that SENDS anger spreading everywhere

incessant.hook: IN-CESSANT: never ceasing - continuing without any pause

inchoate.hook: Just starting to CHEW on a raw idea - not fully formed yet

incisive.hook: Makes a precise INCISION - sharp, clear, and insightful

incite.hook: Light the IGNITE fuse - provoke strong reactions

incoherent.hook: IN-COHERENT: NOT COHERENT - ideas scattered everywhere

incongruous.hook: IN-CONGRUOUS: NOT CONGRUENT - totally out of place

inconsequential.hook: IN-CONSEQUENTIAL: has NO CONSEQUENCE - utterly unimportant

incontrovertible.hook: IN-CONTROVERTIBLE: can NOT be CONTROVERTED - impossible to deny

incredulous.hook: IN-CRED-ULOUS: gives NO CREDIT to what they hear - won't believe

incriminate.hook: IN-CRIME-INATE: put into the crime - make appear guilty

indefatigable.hook: IN-DE-FATIGABLE: NEVER gets FATIGUED - absolutely tireless

indefensible.hook: IN-DEFENSIBLE: can NOT be DEFENDED - impossible to justify

indelible.hook: IN-DELETE-IBLE: impossible to delete - permanent and unforgettable

indict.hook: IN-DICT: dictated into court records - formally charged with a crime

indifferent.hook: Makes NO DIFFERENCE to them - they simply don't care

indigent.hook: IN-DIG-ENT: digging in dirt for food - extremely poor and needy

indolent.hook: IN-DOLE-NT: on the dole, not working - lazy and avoiding effort

ineffective.hook: IN-EFFECTIVE: NOT EFFECTIVE at all - produces no results

inert.hook: IN-ERT: insert nothing, it just sits there - lacking ability to move

inexorable.hook: IN-EXOR-ABLE: no begging (exoration) will stop it - unstoppable

infer.hook: IN-FER: CARRY (fer) meaning IN from clues and evidence

inflame.hook: Set AFLAME - intensify anger like throwing gasoline on fire

inflexible.hook: IN-FLEXIBLE: NOT FLEXIBLE - rigid as an iron rod

ingenious.hook: IN-GENIUS: having genius inside - cleverly inventive

ingenuity.hook: Inner GENIUS at work - cleverness and inventiveness

ingenuous.hook: IN-GENUINE: genuinely innocent inside - naive and unsuspecting

ingrained.hook: Stuck deep in the GRAIN of the wood - can't be removed

inhibit.hook: IN-HIBIT: put a PROHIBITION from within - restrain

inimical.hook: IN-AMICAL: NOT AMICABLE at all - harmful and hostile

innovative.hook: IN-NOVA-TIVE: introducing NOVA (new) and fresh ideas

inordinate.hook: IN-ORDINATE: not in ordinary order - unusually excessive

inscrutable.hook: IN-SCRUTABLE: can NOT be SCRUTINIZED - impossible to read

insipid.hook: IN-SIPID: NO SAPID (taste) at all - bland and dull

insouciant.hook: IN-SO-CIANT: so not caring - casually unconcerned and carefree

instigate.hook: Open the GATE and let trouble rush IN - start problems

insular.hook: Stuck on an ISLAND (insula) - isolated and narrow-minded

integrity.hook: INTEGER-ITY: whole like an integer - complete moral wholeness

intelligible.hook: INTELLIGENT enough to understand - clear and comprehensible

intensify.hook: Crank the INTENSITY dial up - make stronger

interminable.hook: IN-TERMINATE-ABLE: unable to be terminated - endless and tedious

intermittent.hook: Like INTERMISSIONS in a play - comes and goes irregularly

interregnum.hook: INTER-REGNUM: between two REIGNS - a gap in leadership

intransigent.hook: Will NOT TRANSITION their position - refuses to compromise

intrepid.hook: IN-TREPID: free from TREPIDATION - boldly fearless

intricate.hook: Full of hidden TRICKS inside - complex in every detail

invalidate.hook: Make it IN-VALID - prove it wrong and worthless

inveigh.hook: IN-WEIGH: weighing in heavily against something - speak vehemently against

inventive.hook: Always INVENTing something new - creative mind at work

invidious.hook: Caught on VIDEO doing something unfairly harmful

invigorate.hook: Fill with VIGOR and vitality - energize completely

irascible.hook: IRATE-SCIBLE: easily made irate - hot-tempered and quick to anger

ironic.hook: An IRON that wrinkles your clothes - the unexpected twist

irreconcilable.hook: IR-RECONCILE-ABLE: unable to reconcile - impossible to resolve

irredentist.hook: Wants to RE-DENT (return) lost territory to the homeland

irreverent.hook: IR-REVERENT: NOT REVERENT at all - disrespectful

jejune.hook: Boring as a JUNE rerun on TV - dull and immature

jovial.hook: Happy like the god JOVE (Jupiter) at a feast - cheerful

jubilant.hook: JUBILEE-ANT: an ant celebrating a jubilee - expressing great joy

judicious.hook: Like a wise JUDGE making careful decisions - good judgment

kleptocratic.hook: Ruled by KLEPTOMANIACS who steal everything - government by thieves

labyrinthine.hook: Lost in a LABYRINTH maze - extremely complex and confusing

lackluster.hook: LACKS LUSTER - dull with no shine or sparkle

laconic.hook: From LACONIA (Sparta) - Spartans used very few words

lambaste.hook: BASTE the LAMB on a spit - roast someone with harsh criticism

lament.hook: LA-MEANT: 'la' the sad song note - express grief and deep regret

lamentable.hook: Deserves a LAMENT - so bad it makes you cry with regret

languid.hook: LANG-QUID: language too liquid to hold shape - slow and dreamy

languish.hook: LANGUAGE of ANGUISH - suffering and weakening from neglect

largesse.hook: Generosity on a LARGE scale - giving big and freely

latent.hook: Running LATE to appear - present but still hidden

laud.hook: We LAUD the LORD with praise - highly praise

laudable.hook: LAUD-ABLE: worthy of being LAUDED with applause

lavish.hook: LA-VISH: making a lavish wish come true - sumptuously rich

lax.hook: LAX airport security letting everyone through - not strict

lethargic.hook: LEATHER-GIC: heavy as leather - sluggish and lacking energy

limpid.hook: Water so CLEAR you see every pebble - transparent

lionize.hook: Treat someone like the LION King - celebrity status

listless.hook: LIST-LESS: no list, no tasks, no energy - lacking enthusiasm

litigious.hook: LITI-GATE-US: always at the litigation gate - prone to lawsuits

logorrhea.hook: Words flowing out like verbal DIARRHEA - can't stop talking

loquacious.hook: LOQUA-cious = TALK-acious. They never stop talking

lucid.hook: LUCID like LUX (light) - clear, bright, easy to understand

lucrative.hook: LUCRE-ATIVE: full of lucre (money) - producing great profit

lugubrious.hook: LUGging around a heavy bag of sadness - overly mournful

magnanimous.hook: MAGNA (great) + ANIMUS (spirit): great-spirited, generous and forgiving

maintain.hook: Keep it on the MAIN TRAIN track - continue and assert

malevolent.hook: MAL (bad) + VOLENT (wishing): wishing evil on others

malice.hook: MAL (bad) + ICE: cold as ICE with harmful intent

malicious.hook: MAL-ICIOUS: mal means bad - intending to cause harm

malign.hook: MAL (bad) + SIGN: giving BAD signs about someone

malleable.hook: MALL clay - easily shaped and molded by influence

mandate.hook: MAN-DATE: the man sets the date - an official order with authority

manifest.hook: A ship's MANIFEST lists everything clearly and obviously

marginalize.hook: MARGIN-ALIZE: pushing to the margins of the page - treat as insignificant

maverick.hook: Top Gun's MAVERICK - independent rebel who breaks the rules

mawkish.hook: Makes your MAW (stomach) sick with too much sentiment

meandering.hook: A river MEANDERS - wandering without clear direction

measured.hook: Every response carefully MEASURED - controlled and deliberate

meek.hook: Like a mouse that goes MEEK - quiet, gentle, and submissive

melancholy.hook: MELON-COLLIE: a sad collie dog eating a melon alone - deep persistent sadness

mellifluous.hook: MELLI (honey) + FLUENT: sweet honey flowing smoothly - sweet-sounding

mendacious.hook: MEN-DACIOUS: men who are audacious liars - habitually dishonest

mercantilist.hook: MERCHANT + LIST: government controls the MERCHANT list

mercenary.hook: No MERCY unless you pay - motivated purely by money

mercurial.hook: Like liquid MERCURY - unpredictable, changes shape instantly

meritorious.hook: Full of MERIT - deserving praise and reward

metamorphose.hook: META-MORPH-OSE: morphing beyond original form - transform completely

methodical.hook: Follows a strict METHOD step by step - systematic

meticulous.hook: Measures every METRIC down to the last decimal - extremely careful

minimize.hook: Make it MINI - shrink the importance down to nothing

miserliness.hook: A MISER counting every penny - extreme stinginess

mitigate.hook: MITI-GATE: a gate that reduces the flood flow - make less severe

mock.hook: A MOCK exam isn't real - making fun of the real thing

mollify.hook: Make things MELLOW and MILD - soothe someone's anger

moribund.hook: MORI (death) + BOUND: bound for death - near the end

morose.hook: MORE and MORE sadness piling up - deeply gloomy

muddle.hook: Stuck in thick MUD - everything's a confused mess

mundane.hook: As boring as a MONDAY morning - ordinary and dull

munificent.hook: MONEY flowing MAGNIFICENTLY - very generous giving

murky.hook: Can't see through MURKY water - unclear and obscure

mutable.hook: Can MUTATE and change form - not fixed

myopic.hook: MY-OPTIC nerves are short - nearsighted, lacking foresight

naive.hook: A NEWBIE who hasn't learned the game yet - lacking experience

nascent.hook: NASA's rocket on the launchpad - just beginning to lift off

nebulous.hook: Like a space NEBULA - cloudy, hazy, and vague

nefarious.hook: The villain's NEFARIOUS scheme - wickedly criminal

negligent.hook: NEGLECT in action - a careless person ignoring their duty

negligible.hook: So small you can NEGLECT it entirely - too tiny to matter

non sequitur.hook: Does NOT SEQUENCE logically - conclusion jumps off a cliff

nonchalant.hook: NON-SHALL-ANT: 'shall not care' ant - casually unconcerned

nostalgic.hook: Your NOSE remembers grandma's cookies - longing for the past

notable.hook: NOTE-ABLE: worthy of taking NOTE of - stands out

novel.hook: A brand new NOVEL you've never read - fresh and original

noxious.hook: NOX-IOUS: nox like toxic - harmful and poisonous

nuance.hook: NEW-ANCE: a NEW angle of subtle difference

nullify.hook: NULL-IFY: make it null - cancel out and void completely

obdurate.hook: OB-DURABLE: stubbornness so DURABLE it never breaks

obfuscate.hook: OB-FUSCATE: fuse the clarity shut - make unclear on purpose

objective.hook: Look at the OBJECT itself, not your feelings about it - unbiased

oblivious.hook: O-BLIV-IOUS: living in oblivion - completely unaware of surroundings

obscure.hook: Hidden in darkness and shadow - unclear, little known

obsequious.hook: OB-SEQUI (follow): always following behind the boss - overly submissive

obsolete.hook: SO utterly DELETED from use - completely outdated

obstinacy.hook: As stubborn as an OX that won't move - pure stubbornness

obstruct.hook: Put a STRUCTURE in the way to BLOCK the path

obtuse.hook: An OBTUSE angle is wide and slow to get the point

obviate.hook: Make it OBVIOUS that it's no longer needed - prevent

odious.hook: An ODOR so terrible it's hateful and disgusting

oligarchic.hook: OLLIE and his tiny gang rule everything - small elite power

ominous.hook: Full of bad OMENS - dark clouds of threat gathering

onerous.hook: Even ONE task feels ENORMOUS - burdensome and heavy

ontology.hook: ON-TOLOGY: the study of what's ON existing and being real

opaque.hook: PACKed so dense that no light passes through - unclear

opulent.hook: OPE-LENT: opening a lent of gold - ostentatiously rich and luxurious

ornate.hook: Covered in ORNAMENTs - highly decorated and elaborate

ossified.hook: OSSI (bone) + FIED: turned to BONE - rigid and unchanging

ossify.hook: OS-SIFY: os means bone - turning to bone, becoming rigid

ostentatious.hook: OSTENT-ATION: putting on a show for the station - showy to impress

ostracize.hook: OSTRICH-SIZE: making someone an ostrich - excluded, head in sand alone

outspoken.hook: Speaks OUT freely and boldly - frank and direct

overt.hook: OVER-T: right out in the OPEN for everyone to see

overwrought.hook: OVER-WROUGHT: over-worked with too much emotion

pacify.hook: PACI (peace): bring PEACE - calm everything down

painstaking.hook: PAINS-TAKING: taking great pains over every detail - extremely thorough

palliate.hook: PALL-IATE: a pall (covering) over the symptoms - relieve without curing

panegyric.hook: PAN (all) + EGYRIC: ALL praise, formal speech of honor

paradigm.hook: PARA-DIGM: the model to DIG into and follow

paradigmatic.hook: Serving as the PARADIGM - the ultimate model example

paradox.hook: PARA (beside) + DOX: beside the doctrine, seeming contradiction

parochial.hook: Stuck in your PARISH - can't see beyond the church walls

parsimonious.hook: PARSES every single MONEY coin - painfully stingy

parsimony.hook: PARSE every PENNY - extreme unwillingness to spend

partisan.hook: Picks a PARTY side and fights for it - biased and loyal

patrimonial.hook: PATRI (father): power inherited from FATHER - family-based rule

paucity.hook: A POOR CITY with almost nothing - scarcity and lack

pedantic.hook: A PEDANT nitpicking every tiny detail obsessively

pedestrian.hook: Just a regular PEDESTRIAN walking by - nothing special, dull

peevish.hook: Full of pet PEEVES - constantly irritable

pellucid.hook: PER-LUCID: perfectly LUCID - crystal clear transparency

penurious.hook: PENNY-URIOUS: furious about spending a penny - extremely poor or miserly

perceptive.hook: Strong PERCEPTION powers - insightful and observant

perennial.hook: PERE-NNIAL: perennial flowers that bloom every year - lasting and recurring

perfidious.hook: PER-FIDIOUS: per-fidy (bad faith) - deceitful and untrustworthy

perfidy.hook: PER-FIDY: not FIDE (faithful) at all - betrayal and treachery

perfunctory.hook: PER-FUNCTION: barely functions as effort - minimal and careless

peripheral.hook: On the PERIPHERY, around the edges - not central

perpetual.hook: A PERPETUAL motion machine that never stops - forever

perspicacious.hook: SPEC(tacles) that see everything clearly - super perceptive

perspicuous.hook: PER-SPIC(see)-UOUS: can SEE right through it - clearly expressed

pervasive.hook: Like a VASE of strong perfume - spreads absolutely everywhere

petulant.hook: A spoiled PET whining and stamping - childishly irritable

philanthropic.hook: PHIL-ANTHRO-PIC: phil (love) + anthro (human) - loving humanity, charitable

phlegmatic.hook: Thick as PHLEGM - slow, unmoved, and calmly unemotional

pillory.hook: Tied to a PILLAR in the town square for public shaming

pithy.hook: PITHY like the pith of a fruit - the essential core, concise and forceful

pivot.hook: PIVOT on a basketball court - sharp turn in direction

pivotal.hook: The PIVOT point everything turns on - critically important

placate.hook: Put them in a calm peaceful PLACE - soothe their anger

placatory.hook: Designed to PLACATE - intended to calm someone down

placid.hook: A PLACID lake at dawn - perfectly calm and peaceful

plaintive.hook: PLAIN-TIVE: the plain cry of grief - sounding sad and mournful

platitudinous.hook: FLAT-itude remarks - flat, boring, unoriginal statements

plausible.hook: Deserves APPLAUSE for how believable it sounds

pliable.hook: PLI-ABLE: able to be plied (bent) - easily influenced or shaped

pliant.hook: PLIES easily like soft leather - flexible and bendable

pluralistic.hook: PLURAL (many) + ISTIC: involving MANY different groups

polarized.hook: Split to opposite POLES - North vs South, extreme division

polemic.hook: POLE-MIC: grabbing the mic on a pole to attack - strong verbal assault

polemical.hook: Taking a strong POLE position in a fierce argument

polymath.hook: POLY-MATH: poly means many + math = many subjects mastered

pompous.hook: Full of POMP and ceremony - puffed up with self-importance

pontificate.hook: Speaking like the PONTIFF (Pope) - pompous moral lecturing

portentous.hook: Full of PORTENTS and omens - signaling something serious ahead

posit.hook: Take a POSITION and state it as fact - assert firmly

postulate.hook: POST-U-LATE: posting an assumption late - assume without proof

pragmatic.hook: A PRACTICAL approach to problems - focused on results

precarious.hook: Better CARE because it's dangerously unstable and risky

precipitate.hook: Falls like sudden PRECIPITATION - causes things to happen fast

preclude.hook: PRE-CLUDE (close): CLOSE the door BEFORE they enter - prevent

precocious.hook: PRE-COOKED: cooked before schedule - advanced for their age

prescience.hook: PRE-SCIENCE: knowing the science BEFORE it's discovered

prescient.hook: PRE-SCIENT: pre-science, knowing before the science proves it - having foresight

preserve.hook: Like fruit PRESERVES in a jar - keep safe from spoiling

presuppose.hook: PRE-SUPPOSE: SUPPOSE something is true BEFORE checking facts

pretentious.hook: PRETENDING to be more important than you really are

prevaricate.hook: PRE-VARI-CATE: VARY your answers to dodge the truth

principled.hook: Guided by strong PRINCIPLES - moral backbone of steel

pristine.hook: Clean as a PRISM reflecting pure white light - untouched

probative.hook: Sounds like PROVE-ATIVE: helps PROVE the case - providing proof

probity.hook: PROBE-ITY: if you probe their character, you find integrity - moral uprightness

prodigal.hook: PRODIGAL son who spent all dad's money - recklessly extravagant

profligate.hook: PROF-LIGATE: a professor who litigates with money - recklessly wasteful

profuse.hook: PRO-FUSE: fusing out abundantly in every direction

progressive.hook: Moving PROGRESS forward - favoring reform and change

proliferate.hook: PRO-LIFE-RATE: LIFE multiplies at a rapid RATE - increase fast

prolix.hook: PRO at LICKING the microphone for way too long - wordy

propitious.hook: The gods are PRO you - conditions are favorable

prosaic.hook: Plain as PROSE - no poetry, just dull ordinary language

prosperous.hook: PROSPER-OUS: full of prosperity - successful and thriving

protean.hook: PROTEUS the shape-shifting Greek god - readily changing form

protract.hook: TRACTORS move painfully slowly - prolong and drag out

protracted.hook: PRO-TRACTED: tracted (pulled) out longer - drawn out beyond expected

provincial.hook: Stuck in a small PROVINCE - can't see the bigger world

provoke.hook: PRO-VOKE: professionally INVOKE anger or reaction

prudent.hook: A wise PRUDE who carefully avoids all unnecessary risk

pugnacious.hook: A PUG dog snarling and wanting to fight everyone

purge.hook: PURGE like purging a computer of viruses - rid of unwanted elements

qualified.hook: Comes with a QUALIFIER that limits the statement

quell.hook: QUELL = KILL the uprising and silence it - suppress

querulous.hook: Always QUERYING and complaining in a whiny voice

quiescent.hook: QUIET-ESCENT: becoming quiet - inactive and at rest

quirky.hook: Full of unique QUIRKS - unusual in an interesting way

quixotic.hook: Like Don QUIXOTE fighting windmills - noble but unrealistic

rancor.hook: RANK hatred that's gone sour - deep bitter resentment

rapport.hook: RAP-PORT: rapping at the port together - harmonious mutual connection

rapprochement.hook: Two rappers APPROACH each other to make peace

reactionary.hook: REACTS against all change - wants to go backward

rebuke.hook: RE-BOOK someone for their mistakes - criticize sharply

recalcitrant.hook: RE-CALCITRANT: kicking back (calcitrant from Latin calx, heel) - stubbornly uncooperative

reclusive.hook: RE-CLUSIVE: closing yourself in again - avoiding company of others

reconcile.hook: RE-COUNCIL: bring the COUNCIL back together in harmony

recondite.hook: Hidden (condite) in deep layers - very difficult to understand

reductionist.hook: REDUCES complex issues to oversimplified bite-sized pieces

refractory.hook: RE-FACTORY: refusing to be re-made in the factory - stubbornly resistant

refute.hook: REFUSE to accept and kick it back - prove wrong with evidence

regressive.hook: RE-GRESSIVE: going backward instead of PROGRESSING

reify.hook: Make it REAL - treat an abstract concept as concrete

reinforce.hook: RE-IN-FORCE: forcing strength back in - strengthen further

relegated.hook: Sent to a LOWER LEAGUE - assigned to a lesser position

relentless.hook: RELENT-LESS: never RELENTS - persistent and unyielding

remarkable.hook: REMARK-ABLE: worthy of a REMARK - stands out as notable

remorse.hook: RE-MORSE: morse code tapping guilt over and over - deep regret for wrongdoing

renounce.hook: RE-NOUNCE: ANNOUNCE again that you're formally giving up

repentant.hook: RE-PENT-ANT: an ant who re-pents (goes back to confession) - showing sincere regret

reprimand.hook: RE-PRIM-AND: getting primed for a scolding again - formal disapproval

reproach.hook: RE-APPROACH someone to express your disappointment

repudiate.hook: Toss it in a PUDDLE and walk away - reject strongly

rescind.hook: RE-SCIND: scissoring it away - officially cancel and revoke

reserved.hook: Emotions kept in RESERVE - emotionally restrained

resigned.hook: SIGNED away your fight - accepting the unpleasant situation

resilient.hook: SPRINGS back like rubber - bounces and recovers quickly

resolute.hook: RE-SOLUTE: solid resolution that doesn't dissolve - firmly determined

restrained.hook: Held back by RESTRAINTS - controlled, not extreme

reticent.hook: Keeps words behind a NET - reserved and not talkative

retrograde.hook: RETRO-GRADE: going back a grade - moving backward to inferior state

revere.hook: Paul REVERE was revered as an American hero

reverent.hook: Shows deep REVERENCE - respectful and admiring

revisionist.hook: Always making REVISIONS to established historical views

revoke.hook: RE-VOKE: taking back the invocation - officially cancel a right

rhetoric.hook: RHETT-ORIC: Rhett Butler's fancy persuasive speeches - impressive language

rigid.hook: RIGID like a frozen stick - stiff and strictly unyielding

rigorous.hook: Full of RIGOR - thorough and exact in every detail

robust.hook: RO-BUST: BUSTING with strength and health

rudimentary.hook: RUDIMENT: only the RUDE basics covered - nothing advanced

sagacious.hook: Wise as a SAGE sitting on a mountain - deeply insightful

salient.hook: The SAIL that towers above the waves - most noticeable point

salubrious.hook: A SALUTE to your health - health-giving environment

salutary.hook: SALUT-ARY: a health SALUTE - beneficial effects

sanctimonious.hook: Pretending to be a SAINT - fake moral superiority

sanction.hook: From the SANCTUARY: approve OR punish (tricky dual meaning!)

sanguine.hook: SANG a happy upbeat song - warmly optimistic

sardonic.hook: Packed like SARDINES with dark mocking cynical humor

satirical.hook: Using SATIRE as a weapon - humor that cuts and criticizes

scathing.hook: SCATHE-ING: scorching with words - severely critical and withering

scrupulous.hook: Full of SCRUPLES - extremely careful about right and wrong

sectarian.hook: Narrowly devoted to one SECT - won't consider outsiders

seditious.hook: Sits down (SED) in rebellion - encouraging revolt against authority

seminal.hook: SEMIN-AL: like a seed (semen) that grows into something huge - foundational

sententious.hook: Drops heavy SENTENCES of moral wisdom nobody asked for

sequester.hook: SE-QUEST-ER: sent on a quest alone - isolate and set apart

servile.hook: Overly eager to SERVE - submissive as a doormat

shrewd.hook: Sharp as a SHREW with a blade - clever in judgment

simmering.hook: Like a pot SIMMERING on the stove - quietly building heat

sincere.hook: SINE CERA (without wax): no filler, genuinely real

skeptical.hook: A born SKEPTIC who questions everything - show me proof!

skittish.hook: SKIT-TISH: jumpy like a cat watching a skit - nervous and easily frightened

slander.hook: Words that LAND on someone like mud - false damaging talk

slapdash.hook: SLAP it together and DASH away - careless and hurried

sober.hook: Stone cold SOBER - serious, no emotional intoxication

solemn.hook: SO SOLEMN it's like a funeral - serious and formal

somber.hook: SOM-BER: some bear the weight of sadness - dark and gloomy

sonorous.hook: SONIC boom resonance - deep, rich, impressive sound

sophisticated.hook: Complex as a SOPHIST's argument - refined and worldly

soporific.hook: Puts you in a SOPOR (deep sleep) - professor's boring lecture

sound.hook: A SOUND structure won't collapse - solid and sensible

spare.hook: A SPARE room with nothing extra - minimal and simple

spartan.hook: SPARTAN warriors lived with zero luxury - plain and austere

specious.hook: Looks SPECIAL and convincing but it's actually misleading

speculative.hook: Just SPECULATING wildly - based on guesses, not facts

sporadic.hook: Pops up like mushroom SPORES - randomly, irregularly

spur.hook: Cowboy's SPUR kicks the horse into action - stimulate!

spurious.hook: A SPUR-of-the-moment fake - false and not genuine

stagnant.hook: STAG-NANT: a stag standing still in a nant (brook) - not flowing, no growth

stagnate.hook: A STAGNANT swamp pond - nothing grows, nothing moves

stalwart.hook: STALL-WART: like a wart that won't leave the stall - loyal and unmovable

steadfast.hook: STEADY-FAST: holding steady and fast - firmly loyal and unwavering

stealthy.hook: STEALTH bomber mode - secretive and undetected

stentorian.hook: Like STENTOR the Greek herald - voice so loud it shakes walls

stereotypical.hook: A TYPICAL STEREOTYPE - predictable and uncomplicated

stilted.hook: Walking awkwardly on tall STILTS - stiff and unnatural

stingy.hook: It STINGS to spend even a penny - unwilling to give

stochastic.hook: Like the STOCK market graph - random unpredictable ups and downs

stoic.hook: Face of STONE - enduring pain quietly without emotion

stolid.hook: SOLID as a stone - calm and showing zero emotion

strident.hook: Taking aggressive STRIDES while yelling - loud and harsh

subjugate.hook: SUB-JUG-ATE: put under the jug - bring under domination

sublime.hook: SUB-LIME: below the lime light but so excellent it transcends - awe-inspiring

subservient.hook: SUB-SERVANT: a servant below a servant - excessively willing to serve

subside.hook: SUB-SIDE: sinking to the sub-side - gradually declining and calming

substantiate.hook: SUB-STANCE-IATE: giving substance to a claim - provide supporting evidence

subterfuge.hook: SUBTER-FUGE: fugitive going underground - deceit to achieve a goal

subversive.hook: Working from SUB-terranean levels to undermine authority

subvert.hook: SUB-VERT (turn): turn from underneath - overthrow quietly

succinct.hook: SUCK out all extra words - brief, clear, and tight

supercilious.hook: Raising your SUPERCILIA (eyebrows) at peasants - arrogant snob

superficial.hook: Only on the SURFACE level - shallow, not deep at all

superfluous.hook: SUPER FLOW of extra stuff nobody needs - unnecessary overflow

supersede.hook: Something SUPER sits (sede) in its chair - replaced!

supplant.hook: PLANT yourself in someone else's spot and take over

surfeit.hook: SURFing on an excessive wave of too much stuff

surreptitious.hook: A secret REPTILE slithering silently - stealthy and hidden

sycophant.hook: A SICK ELEPHANT that flatters the zookeeper for extra peanuts

syncretic.hook: SYNCing different belief systems together into one blend

systematic.hook: Follows the SYSTEM precisely - methodical and organized

tacit.hook: TACIT sounds like TACIT-URN (silent) - understood without being stated

taciturn.hook: Keeps words TACIT (silent) locked in an URN - speaks very little

tangential.hook: Going off on a TANGENT - only slightly related to the topic

tarnished.hook: Like old silver that's TARNISHED - reputation damaged and dulled

tautological.hook: TAUTO (same) + LOGICAL: saying the SAME thing twice differently

taxonomy.hook: TAXIs organized into neat categories - a classification system

teleological.hook: TELE (far/end) + LOGICAL: explaining by the end PURPOSE

temerity.hook: Runs out of TIME to think and acts with reckless boldness

temper.hook: TEMPER the temperature - moderate and soften the extremes

temperate.hook: Keep your TEMPER moderate and even - not extreme

tenable.hook: TEN-ABLE: able to hold (tenere=hold) - defensible position

tenacious.hook: Holds on with all TEN fingers and refuses to let go

tendentious.hook: TENDS to push a particular biased viewpoint

tentative.hook: Plans written in a wobbly TENT with pencil - not final, hesitant

tenuous.hook: Hanging by a TENdon as thin as thread - weak and fragile

tepid.hook: TEA that's gone lukewarm - bleh, lacking any enthusiasm

terse.hook: TEXT-TERSE: texting in the shortest way possible - brief

thorough.hook: Goes THROUGH every single detail - complete and careful

thwart.hook: Throw a WART into their plans - block and prevent success

timorous.hook: TIMOR-OUS: full of timor (fear) like Timor the timid mouse

token.hook: Just a TOKEN gesture - symbolic but not real or substantial

torpid.hook: TORPEDO that's a dud - sluggish, inactive, going nowhere

tout.hook: TOUT like shouting out - promote and praise energetically

tractable.hook: Easy to TRACK and steer - controllable and manageable

transient.hook: In TRANSIT - just passing through, short-lived stay

transmute.hook: TRANS-MUTE: transforming from mute to something else - change in nature

transparent.hook: TRANS-PARENT: see RIGHT THROUGH like glass - totally clear

trenchant.hook: Cuts a sharp TRENCH through weak arguments - incisive

trepidation.hook: TRIP-idation: tripping over your own feet from nervous fear

trite.hook: TRIED too many times before - overused and worn out

truculent.hook: A TRUCK barreling aggressively toward you - defiantly hostile

turgid.hook: Writing swollen like a TURGID river after rain - bloated and pompous

tyrannical.hook: TYRANT-ICAL: like a tyrant - exercising power cruelly

ubiquitous.hook: U-B-QUIT-OUS: you can't QUIT appearing - present everywhere!

unanimous.hook: UNI (one) + ANIMUS (mind): everyone of ONE MIND - full agreement

unassuming.hook: NOT ASSUMING any importance for themselves - genuinely modest

unconscionable.hook: Against your CONSCIENCE - shockingly unfair and wrong

underhanded.hook: Doing deals UNDER the table with hidden HANDS - dishonest

undermine.hook: Digging a MINE underneath the fortress walls - weaken gradually

underscore.hook: Draw a line UNDER the word to SCORE emphasis on it

understated.hook: STATED less than what it really is - subtly expressed

unequivocal.hook: UN-EQUIVOCAL: NOT vague at all - completely clear and certain

unexceptionable.hook: No one can take EXCEPTION to it - perfectly acceptable

unfair.hook: UN-FAIR: the game is NOT FAIR - unjust treatment

unified.hook: Made into ONE (UNI) - joined together as a whole

unorthodox.hook: UN-ORTHODOX: breaks from the ORTHODOX tradition

unprecedented.hook: No PRECEDENT exists in history - never happened before

unscrupulous.hook: UN-SCRUPLES: without scruples - having no moral principles

untenable.hook: Can't be a TENANT here - this position can't be held

upbraid.hook: UP-BRAID: braiding someone up with harsh words - scold severely

uphold.hook: HOLD it UP high - support and maintain the standard

upright.hook: Standing straight UP and doing what's RIGHT - honest and moral

usurp.hook: U-SLURP power like slurping a milkshake - seize without authority

utopian.hook: Dreaming of UTOPIA - beautiful but totally unrealistic

vacillate.hook: Slippery as VASELINE between two choices - can't decide

valid.hook: Has full VALUE and stands up to scrutiny - logically sound

validate.hook: Stamp it VALID - confirm it's true and correct

vapid.hook: The VAPOR evaporated leaving nothing behind - dull and empty

vehement.hook: Hits you like a VEHICLE - intensely forceful passion

veiled.hook: VEILED behind a veil - disguised and not openly expressed

veneer.hook: Only NEAR the surface - a thin pretty coating hiding the ugly

venerable.hook: Worthy of VENERATION - deeply respected with reverence

venerate.hook: Show VENERATION - regard with the deepest respect

veracious.hook: VERA-CIOUS: vera means truth - truthful and accurate

veracity.hook: VERA-CITY: a city of truth - the quality of being truthful

verbose.hook: Too many VERBS, nouns, and adjectives - way too wordy

verisimilitude.hook: VERY SIMILAR to the truth - has the appearance of being real

versatile.hook: VERSE-A-TILE: able to write any verse on any tile - adaptable to many functions

vestige.hook: VEST-IGE: an old vest is all that remains - a trace of something past

viable.hook: Has the VITAlity and life to actually work - possible

vicissitude.hook: Life's VICIOUS sudden changes in fortune and circumstances

vilify.hook: Turn someone into a VILLAIN with harsh words - slander

vindicate.hook: VIN(ctory) in court - cleared from blame and justified

vindictive.hook: Seeks VINDICATION through revenge - wants payback

virtuous.hook: VIRTUE-OUS: full of virtue - having high moral standards

virulent.hook: VIRUS-LENT: a virus that was lent and spread - extremely harmful

vitriolic.hook: Throwing VITRIOL (sulfuric acid) of pure bitter hatred

vituperate.hook: VITU-PERATE: viper-ate, attacking with viper's tongue - harsh verbal abuse

vivid.hook: Full of VIVE (life) - bright, intense, impossible to ignore

vociferous.hook: VOICE so FEROCIOUS it fills the entire room - loud!

volatile.hook: Ready to VAULT into chaos at any second - unpredictable

voluble.hook: VOLUME turned all the way up - talks and talks and talks

vulnerable.hook: Full of VULNERabilities - exposed and open to harm

wane.hook: The MOON waning - getting smaller and dimmer each night

wary.hook: On guard as if marching to WAR - cautious and watchful

weak.hook: The WEAK link in a chain - no strength, easily broken

whimsical.hook: Following every WHIM like a butterfly - playfully unusual

wistful.hook: WISH-FUL: full of wishes for what's gone - yearning with gentle sadness

wry.hook: A twisted WRY smile that says more than words - dry ironic humor

yielding.hook: A YIELD sign at the intersection - giving way to others

zealous.hook: Burning with ZEAL like a sports fan - intense devotion and passion
